name: Jic
body:
Is it so that you have to use JIRA, but hate the very idea of using WebUI? Got tired waiting for web page to load? Or your eyes got used to green-on-black world so much that JIRA WebUI's bright background is just painful for you?

Try jic - a command line client for JIRA, written in [Python|http://www.python.org], lightweight and easy to install.

Currently development is done privately, but it is expected to go public by 25 November 2013. Stay tuned. 

Authors and Contributors
------------------------
This project is developed under the [Linaro|http://www.linaro.org] umbrella - thanks to Linaro for helping engineers getting a more suitable interface to jIRA.

The project is lead by @ototo, who is also the only developer so far, but your complaints, ideas and patches are welcome!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
